intro: Usionis fuscata, commonly known as the dark usionis, is a species of flowering plant native to certain regions of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its dark green, leathery leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in tropical and subtropical forests. Usionis fuscata is valued for its ornamental appeal and has some traditional uses in local medicine.
